meanings.definition: Relating to or intended to reduce anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The antianxiety music helped me relax before the big test.
meanings.sent2: She took an antianxiety pill before boarding the plane.
meanings.sent3: The antianxiety tea made her feel as calm as a sleeping kitten.
meanings.sent4: His soothing voice acted like an antianxiety blanket on her nerves.
meanings.sent5: The soft, gentle breeze had an antianxiety effect on the worried child.

meanings.definition: A medication or treatment used to alleviate anxiety.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed an antianxiety for her panic attacks.
meanings.sent2: He keeps his antianxiety in his bag in case of emergencies.
meanings.sent3: The antianxiety was like a magic potion that made her worries disappear.
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of antianxiety was a lifeline in times of stress.
meanings.sent5: The antianxiety brought a sense of peace to her troubled mind.
